title: Broken
description: I lost her once. I won't lose her again.After my brother's death, I was drowning.Delilah was my life raft.We were opposites, the outspoken art student and the brooding athlete. She was passionate where I was apathetic, bright where I was dark, soft where I was hard.For two years, we had everything. Then she left and took my heart with her.I tried to heal. To throw myself into medical school. To forget her.I thought I did.Until today.Those blue eyes, that sweet smile, the soft groan--that's my Delilah.As soon as I hear her laugh, I know.She's what's missing from my life.I have three days. Either I win her back or I stay broken forever.From the Broken is a standalone second chance romance full of heat, heart, and heartbreak. Come see why readers say "Crystal Kaswell is the master of writing sharp, wounded characters who keep you on your toes."
author: Crystal Kaswell
